dialogueLines.speaker: Elder Mira
dialogueLines.text: Welcome to Archive Village, young explorer!

dialogueLines.speaker: Elder Mira
dialogueLines.text: This place holds many secrets from the old world.

dialogueLines.speaker: Elder Mira
dialogueLines.text: Search the ruins, talk to the villagers, and piece together what was lost.

dialogueLines.speaker: Elder Mira
dialogueLines.text: Be careful out there. The archives can be tricky!
